AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description:
Natalia Pundyk is a Polish interior designer renowned for her innovative approach to creating harmonious spaces. With expertise in interior, commercial, retail, and architectural design, she has established a diverse portfolio that reflects her commitment to functionality and aesthetics. Her work experience includes roles as a freelance interior designer for private and public spaces, chief architectural designer at Art Village DVLP in Texas, USA, and workspace designer at SoftServe.

Through her dedication and creativity, Natalia has made a significant impact on the interior design industry, earning recognition and appreciation from clients and peers alike.

tile1.title: DESIGN PROJECT FOR COMMERCIAL & OFFICE SPACES
tile1.content: Concept studying the needs, brand analysis, premises analysis, defining a general style, sketching key ideas Planning development of zonal division, functional arrangement, customer journey, focal points, product placement Design in detail Development of all interior elements, displayed in 3D visualizations and materials selection Design of showcases and outdoor areas Letting people find out about your business without waiting for them to come in. Drawings Everything you need to implement the design: drawings for repair, drawings for furniture and custom elements execution Graphic elements Design of POS-materials, navigation elements, signs and advertisement elements. Specification of equipment and materials Information of products and facing materials to be purchased

tile2.title: DESIGN PROJECT FOR PRIVATE SPACES
tile2.content: Concept studying the needs and preferences, premises analysis, defining a general style, sketching key ideas Planning development of zonal division, functional arrangement Design in detail Development of all interior elements, displayed in 3D visualizations and materials selection Drawings Everything you need to implement the design: drawings for repair, drawings for furniture and custom elements execution Specification of equipment and materials Information of products and facing materials to be purchased

tile3.content:
<title>SUPERVISION</title>We will gladly guide you through the implementation of your project and help you avoid unforeseen situations and issues along the way.

<title>PARTIAL PROJECT</title>If you don't need the entire list of services, or you are already at a certain stage of work on the premises, please contact us to discuss an optimal project for you.

<title>CONSULTING</title>If you hesitate about your project you can always contact us for advice. We can help you if:
you are not sure if a certain premiss is the right choice
you want to consider the ideas for using the space
you need an outside view on the possibilities of improving the space
